commands.snap.title: Open Easy CodeSnap
commands.openSettings.title: Easy CodeSnap: Open Settings
commands.importSettings.title: Easy CodeSnap: Import CodeSnap Settings
easy-codesnap.lockOnOpen: Locks the snap screen on open. Locked screens do not respond to selection changes.
easy-codesnap.linkOnOpen: Links the snap screen to the editor on open. Linked screens respond only to selection changes within the active editor.
easy-codesnap.shutterAction: Controls the behavior of the shutter button when taking a snapshot.
easy-codesnap.shutterAction.copy: Copies the snapshot to the clipboard.
easy-codesnap.shutterAction.save: Saves the snapshot to a file.
easy-codesnap.saveFormat: Specifies the file format for saving snapshots.
easy-codesnap.saveFormat.png: Stores the snapshot in PNG format as a bitmap image that supports transparency.
easy-codesnap.saveFormat.svg: Stores the snapshot in SVG format as a vector image that can be scaled without quality loss.
easy-codesnap.optimizeSvg: Controls whether the svg should be optimized before saving. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Save Format](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.saveFormat%22) is set to `svg`.
easy-codesnap.saveScale: Controls the scale to use when saving snapshots in PNG format.
easy-codesnap.saveScale.0.5: Scales the snapshot to 50% of the original size.
easy-codesnap.saveScale.0.75: Scales the snapshot to 75% of the original size.
easy-codesnap.saveScale.1: Keeps the snapshot at its original size (100%).
easy-codesnap.saveScale.1.5: Scales the snapshot to 150% of the original size.
easy-codesnap.saveScale.2: Scales the snapshot to 200% of the original size.
easy-codesnap.saveScale.3: Scales the snapshot to 300% of the original size.
easy-codesnap.saveScale.4: Scales the snapshot to 400% of the original size.
easy-codesnap.showLineNumbers: Displays line numbers in the snap screen.
easy-codesnap.realLineNumbers: Displays actual line numbers from the selection instead of starting at 1. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Show Line Numbers](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.showLineNumbers%22) is enabled.
easy-codesnap.highlightLineNumber: Highlights the active line number using the `editorLineNumber-activeForeground` theme color. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Show Line Numbers](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.showLineNumbers%22) is enabled.
easy-codesnap.fullLinesSelection: Extends the selection to entire lines when opening the snap screen.
easy-codesnap.windowStyle: Controls the window style for the snap screen.
easy-codesnap.windowStyle.macos: Applies macOS style to the snap screen with traffic light buttons.
easy-codesnap.windowStyle.windows: Applies Windows style to the snap screen with standard window decorations.
easy-codesnap.windowIconType: Controls the window icon style. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Window Style](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.windowStyle%22) is set to `windows`.
easy-codesnap.windowIconType.round: Displays round icons in the window.
easy-codesnap.windowIconType.square: Displays square icons in the window.
easy-codesnap.showWindowTitle: Displays the snap screen window title.
easy-codesnap.windowTitleTemplate: Defines a template for the snap screen window title. Supports {workspace}, {fileName}, and {relativeFolder} variables.
easy-codesnap.showWindowControls: Displays window controls styled according to the selected operating system.
easy-codesnap.roundedCorners: Controls whether the snap screen window has rounded corners.
easy-codesnap.roundingLevel: Controls the border radius level of the snap container. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Rounded Corners](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.roundedCorners%22) is enabled.
easy-codesnap.roundingLevel.1: Applies small rounded corners to the snap container.
easy-codesnap.roundingLevel.2: Applies medium rounded corners to the snap container.
easy-codesnap.roundingLevel.3: Applies large rounded corners to the snap container.
easy-codesnap.roundingLevel.4: Applies extra large rounded corners to the snap container.
easy-codesnap.target: Specifies the capture target when taking a snapshot.
easy-codesnap.target.container: Captures the window along with the container that surrounds it as the snapshot target.
easy-codesnap.target.window: Captures only the window with the code snippet, title, and buttons as the snapshot target.
easy-codesnap.boxShadow: Defines the CSS `box-shadow` property for the snap container.
easy-codesnap.backgroundColor: Defines the background color of the snap container.
easy-codesnap.containerPadding: Defines the padding of the snap container.
easy-codesnap.transparentBackground: Uses a transparent background for the container when taking the snapshot. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Target](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.target%22) is set to `container`.
easy-codesnap.enableResizing: Allows resizing of the snap container. Disabling also resets any previous size adjustments.
easy-codesnap.enableSymbolBreadcrumb: Enables the symbol breadcrumb in the snap screen.
easy-codesnap.maxCharWidth: Specifies the maximum line width in characters. Set to `0` for no limit. Invalid values are ignored, and the last valid value is retained.
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio: Controls the aspect ratio of the snapshot. Only valid when [Easy-codesnap: Target](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.target%22) is set to `container`.
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio.none: Applies no fixed aspect ratio to the snapshot.
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio.1:1: Applies a 1:1 ratio to the snapshot (square format).
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio.4:5: Applies a 4:5 ratio to the snapshot (portrait format).
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio.9:16: Applies a 9:16 ratio to the snapshot (vertical format).
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio.16:9: Applies a 16:9 ratio to the snapshot (widescreen format).
easy-codesnap.aspect-ratio.1.91:1: Applies a 1.91:1 ratio to the snapshot (landscape format).
easy-codesnap.watermark: Displays a watermark on the snapshot.
easy-codesnap.watermarkPosition: Controls the position of the watermark. Top positions are only available when [Easy-codesnap: Target](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22@id:easy-codesnap.target%22) is set to `container`.
easy-codesnap.watermarkPosition.top-left: Places the watermark at the top-left corner of the snapshot.
easy-codesnap.watermarkPosition.top-righ: Places the watermark at the top-right corner of the snapshot.
easy-codesnap.watermarkPosition.bottom-l: Places the watermark at the bottom-left corner of the snapshot.
easy-codesnap.watermarkPosition.bottom-r: Places the watermark at the bottom-right corner of the snapshot.
easy-codesnap.uiCustomColors: Change some UI colors that may conflict with user theme.
easy-codesnap.uiCustomColors.watermarkPo: Changes the background color of the selected Watermark Position input. This can be used to fix issues with themes that may have less color contrast.
easy-codesnap.useFallbackPngExporter: Enables the use of a fallback PNG exporter as main exporter for saving snapshots in PNG format. This can be useful if you encounter issues with the default exporter.
